column4: helo! I have ubuntu 8.10 installed in a VPS and the web console provided by the hosting company is showing a disk usage of 80% but im sure im not using all that. is there a app i can use to manage my disk usage trough shell
df is a terminal command which tells how much disk space you have free.  Try "df -h" in the command line.
It looks like you have two gigs of space left...
